```{r}
library(tcr.explorer)
config <- yaml::read_yaml("config/example_config.yaml")

sce <- load_expression_data(config)
sce <- cluster_cells(sce, config)
sce <- annotate_tcrs(sce, config)
run_gsea(sce, config)
run_cross_reactivity(sce, config)
```
